title: Remove Our Story strip, verify product page filters/nav, add category product rows on homepage

requirements.text: Remove the 'Our Story' strip component (OurStoryStrip) from the homepage (HomePage.tsx). Delete all references to it in the page layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The OurStoryStrip component is no longer rendered on the homepage
No visual gap or empty space is left where the strip used to be
The rest of the homepage layout remains unaffected

requirements.text: Ensure all product category pages (CategoryPageTemplate and all category-specific pages) include a functional filter bar (ProductFilterBar) with metal type, price range, occasion, and sort order filters, and a category navigation bar (HeaderCategoryNav) for switching between categories. If either is missing, add it.

quotes: Is the filter and navigation added in product pages?

acceptanceCriteria: Every product category page shows the ProductFilterBar with working filter controls
A horizontal category navigation bar is visible on every product category page
Selecting a filter updates the displayed product grid accordingly
Clicking a category in the navigation bar routes to that category page

requirements.text: On the homepage, below each product category carousel section (rendered by HomeCategoryCarouselsSection or equivalent), add a horizontally scrollable row of small square product cards. Each row must show products belonging to the relevant category. Exactly 3 square cards should be visible on screen at a time. The scrollbar must be hidden (no visible scrollbar). Each card should display the product image, name, and price.

quotes: below each product category carousel, let the product related to relevant carousel be displayed in small scrollable horizontal squares without a scroll bar. Like 3 square should be seen on screen at once.

acceptanceCriteria: A horizontally scrollable product row appears below each category carousel section on the homepage
Exactly 3 square product cards are visible at a time without needing to scroll
No scrollbar is visible on the row (scrollbar hidden via CSS)
Each card displays the product image cropped to a square aspect ratio, product name, and price in INR
Only products belonging to the relevant category are shown in each row
Clicking a product card navigates to that product's detail page
The rows scroll smoothly by touch/swipe or mouse drag

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Backend schema must not change â€” no new backend endpoints are required; use existing product query hooks
nonGoals: Admin editing of the Our Story strip (removed entirely)
Adding new backend data models or migrations
Infinite scroll or pagination for the category product rows
Adding full product filtering to the homepage category rows
